requirements.title: Assessment Project Creation
requirements.description: Admin creates assessment projects for client organizations using the HR Maturity Framework.
acceptanceCriteria: Super Admin can create a new assessment project for an organization
Can configure assessment deadline
Can select domains to be included (default all 9)
Can configure domain weights (default standard weights)
Initial status is 'Draft'

requirements.title: Questionnaire Interface
requirements.description: Bilingual interface for assessors to select maturity levels for elements within their assigned domains.
acceptanceCriteria: Display elements grouped by domain and dimension
Show bilingual (Arabic/English) descriptions for each maturity level (1-4)
Single choice selection for maturity level
Auto-save progress
Progress bar per domain

requirements.title: Evidence Upload Management
requirements.description: System for uploading and managing evidence files required for assessment validation.
acceptanceCriteria: Upload interface for each element (checklist)
Support drag-and-drop
Restrict file types (PDF, Images, Office) and size
Magic bytes validation for security
Store files in S3/Object Storage (simulated for POC or local)
Link evidence to specific assessment elements

requirements.title: Automated Scoring Engine
requirements.description: Calculate scores based on the 9-domain framework logic.
acceptanceCriteria: Calculate Element Score (0%, 33%, 67%, 100%)
Calculate Domain Score (Existence 30%, Application 50%, Automation 20%)
Calculate Overall Score based on domain weights
Recalculate on any change
Persist scores to database

requirements.title: Assessment Workflow State Machine
requirements.description: Manage the lifecycle states of an assessment.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement states: Draft, In Progress, Under Review, Revision Requested, Completed, Archived
Enforce transition rules (e.g., can't complete if domains incomplete)
Track history of state changes (audit)

requirements.title: Assessment Delegation
requirements.description: Client Admin assigns specific domains to internal assessors.
acceptanceCriteria: Client Admin can list org users
Assign one or more domains to a user
Send email notification on assignment
Restrict assessor view to assigned domains

technicalConstraints: PostgreSQL with JSONB for flexible storage
